intro: Psychotria aborensis, commonly known as the Amazonian psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of South America, particularly the Amazon Basin. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It produces small, red berries that contain the seeds. Psychotria aborensis is often found in the understory of dense tropical forests, thriving in humid and shaded environments.
